org.springframework.data.repository.query

接口 ReactiveQueryByExampleExecutor<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - 

    public interface ReactiveQueryByExampleExecutor<T>
    Interface to allow execution of Query by Example Example instances using a reactive infrastructure.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <S extends T>
      Mono<Long>      		 count(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example)
      Returns the number of instances matching the given Example.
      <S extends T>
      Mono<Boolean>      		 exists(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example)
      Checks whether the data store contains elements that match the given Example.
      <S extends T>
      Flux<S>      		 findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example)
      Returns all entities matching the given Example.
      <S extends T>
      Flux<S>      		 findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example, org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
      Returns all entities matching the given Example applying the given Sort.
      <S extends T>
      Mono<S>      		 findOne(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example)
      Returns a single entity matching the given Example or Mono.empty() if none was found.

    • 方法详细资料

      • findOne

        <S extends T> Mono<S> findOne(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example)
        Returns a single entity matching the given Example or Mono.empty() if none was found.
        参数:
        example - must not be null.
        返回:
        a single entity matching the given Example or Mono.empty() if none was found.
        抛出:
        org.springframework.dao.IncorrectResultSizeDataAccessException - via Mono.error(Throwable) if the example yields more than one result.

      • findAll

        <S extends T> Flux<S> findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example)
        Returns all entities matching the given Example. In case no match could be found Flux.empty() is returned.
        参数:
        example - must not be null.
        返回:
        all entities matching the given Example.

      • findAll

        <S extends T> Flux<S> findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example,
                              org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
        Returns all entities matching the given Example applying the given Sort. In case no match could be found Flux.empty() is returned.
        参数:
        example - must not be null.
        sort - the Sort specification to sort the results by, must not be null.
        返回:
        all entities matching the given Example.

      • count

        <S extends T> Mono<Long> count(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example)
        Returns the number of instances matching the given Example.
        参数:
        example - the Example to count instances for. Must not be null.
        返回:
        the number of instances matching the Example.

      • exists

        <S extends T> Mono<Boolean> exists(org.springframework.data.domain.Example<S> example)
        Checks whether the data store contains elements that match the given Example.
        参数:
        example - the Example to use for the existence check. Must not be null.
        返回:
        true if the data store contains elements that match the given Example.
